alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 20 at 1:07PM MST until December 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM WEDNESDAY TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Cody Foothills, North Big Horn Basin, Southwest Big Horn Basin and Southeast Big Horn Basin. * WHEN...From 5 AM Wednesday to 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of snow on Wednesday will bring a 1 to 2 inches of accumulation and bring difficult travel conditions with snow and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin
